content: ready for trick or treat time or just as a last minute halloween gift this is primarily a key-chain but can be made into a toy by increasing wpi to recreate this toy in aran use a 4 mm hook and increase wool amount by 60% to recreate this toy in chunky use a 5 mm hook and increase wool amount by 200% this pattern is my original pattern by purchasing this pattern you agree to the terms of use please do not claim this pattern as your own you may not sell or distribute the pattern or any part thereof without prior permission **please note ** **all my patterns that are over 2 years old have had the permissions changed it is now permitted to sell items made from these designs the restrictions still apply for all patterns less than 2 years old this means that the permissions will be changing weekly so keep an eye out **
